tool.name: BuildableArea

param.name: project_area
param.dialogReference: Feature class polygon that defines the project area.

param.name: xyzUnit
param.dialogReference: Identifies the horizontal units of the dimensions for the layout design inputs (Foot or Meter). Horizontal units must match the units of the projection

param.name: project_bound_setback
param.dialogReference: Setback from the project boundary. Value should be 0 or positive and will setback inside the project boundary.

param.name: setback_input
param.dialogReference: Setback feature classes, the chosen setback from each feature, and the category

param.name: buildable_output
param.dialogReference: The output buildable area feature class

param.name: setback_output
param.dialogReference: The output feature class delineating all setbacks and their categories

tool.summary: Derives a buildable area based on feature class inputs including the site boundary and as many features as needed as well as their associated setbacks to quickly make a buildable area.
tool.usage: • The output setback feature class contains separate features for each input setback layer and includes the category and the setback distance.
